meanings.definition: To have pioned: to have been the object of a pioner's work.
meanings.sent1: The ground was pioned by the diligent pioner.
meanings.sent2: Yesterday, I pioned the soil to plant flowers.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel pioned through the garden, looking for buried treasures.
meanings.sent4: Her words pioned deep into his heart, leaving a lasting impact.
meanings.sent5: The archaeologist pioned through layers of history to uncover ancient artifacts.
